entries.title: Meta data updates and bug fixes
entries.whats_new: Multiple updates to changelog files, README.md, and example uploads. Fixed bugs related to commit processing and saving to Git. Updated main.py and llm.py, adjusted the model, and added entry limits.
entries.impact: Improves stability and usability of the changelog system, ensuring accurate commit processing and data storage.

entries.title: Web app completion and deployment
entries.whats_new: The AI-powered changelog web app has been completed, enabling automated summaries of Git commits. API deployed on Railway, front-end on Vercel, and code cleanup performed.
entries.breaking_change: The web app now automates change summaries, affecting how users receive changelogs by removing manual entry requirements.
entries.impact: Users will now receive automatic summaries of changes, making updates faster and clearer, with deployment improvements for better availability.

entries.title: Enhanced commit summarization and configuration
entries.whats_new: Improved accuracy in summarizing breaking changes, and added user configurability for Git repositories, OpenAI LLM, and API keys.
entries.breaking_change: Users can now customize their Git repository, LLM, and API key settings, enabling more personalized integration.
entries.impact: Provides users with more control over their configurations, leading to more tailored changelog generation.

entries.title: Cache and deployment strategy updates
entries.whats_new: Implemented and kept the local cache strategy, included limits on entries, and set up cache saving via GitHub API. Also, established deployment on Railway infrastructure.
entries.impact: Ensures efficient performance by caching changelog data locally, with more reliable GitHub integration and deployment consistency.

entries.title: Back-end API deployment and example testing
entries.whats_new: Back-end API successfully deployed on Railway, with test entries and updates to requirements.txt and environment setup. Added API for interacting with Railway and GitHub webhooks.
entries.breaking_change: The back-end API is now accessible to users for custom integrations and automated processes.
entries.impact: Enables external systems to interact with the changelog generator, expanding its usability for various workflows.

entries.title: Interface management and front-end improvements
entries.whats_new: Centralized interface definitions, improved front-end page aesthetics, loading effects, and detail page navigation for changelog entries.
entries.breaking_change: Clicking a changelog entry now directs users to a detailed view of that specific log.
entries.impact: Enhances user experience by making navigation more intuitive and providing detailed insights into changes.

entries.title: API cache strategy and interface updates
entries.whats_new: Implemented JSON cache generation on the backend for faster loading, refined layout, and updated icons. Managed interfaces centrally.
entries.breaking_change: Backend now generates a JSON cache file that front-end loads, improving performance.
entries.impact: Users experience quicker changelog rendering and more stable interface interactions.

entries.title: Initial front-end layout and basic web implementation
entries.whats_new: Developed sidebar navigation, a basic web page for viewing changelogs, and introduced auto-generated content from OpenAI, including impact and breaking change summaries.
entries.breaking_change: The system now auto-generates changelog content from commits, reducing manual updates.
entries.impact: Streamlines the changelog presentation, making updates automatic and accessible to users without manual editing.

entries.title: Backend API and LLM improvements
entries.whats_new: Implemented basic backend API, upgraded LLM to support auto-detection of breaking changes, and improved commit data structure with date, impact, title, news.
entries.breaking_change: The generator now automatically identifies breaking changes if included in commits, enhancing summary accuracy.
entries.impact: Provides more precise and informative changelogs, clearly indicating impactful changes for users.

entries.title: Version updates and environment setup
entries.whats_new: Updated gitignore, environment variables, and created requirements.txt. Set up initial app structure and tested API features.
entries.impact: Sets a solid base for subsequent development, ensuring environmental consistency and initial API readiness.
